example.name: transitive
example.text: She was an unstinting teacher who [*T*-80] won laurels and inspired students , but she will probably never teach again .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Mary Beth Marchand , a Greenville 11th grader , also says [0] Mrs. Yeargin inspired her to go into education .

example.text: `` I 'm inspired [*-1] by the mood of the people . ''
